response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the subtask 4, which is to grasp the apple from the bowl. The apple is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to move the robot to the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Move the robot to the bowl.
(4) Grasp the apple from the bowl.
(5) Move the robot to the fridge.
(6) Put the apple inside the fridge.
(7) Move the robot to the tray.
(8) Grasp the strawberry from the tray.
(9) Move the robot to the fridge.
(10) Put the strawberry inside the fridge.
(11) Close the fridge.
